009package imagingbook.common.math.testing;
010
011import java.util.Random;
012
013import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
014import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
015
016import imagingbook.common.math.MahalanobisDistance;
017import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
018import imagingbook.common.math.Statistics;
019
020@Deprecated                     // move to tests!
021public class MahalanobisTest2 {
022                
023        static final int N = 1000;
024        static final double[] Sigma = {2, 5, 3};
025        static final double[] Mu    = {0, -1, 1};
026        static final int K = Sigma.length;
027
028        public static void main(String[] args) {
029                
030                double[][] samples = makeSamples();
031                MahalanobisDistance mhd = new MahalanobisDistance(samples);
032        
033                double[] mu = mhd.getMeanVector();
034                System.out.println("mu = (sample mu)\n" + Matrix.toString(mu));
035                System.out.println();
036
037                // covariance matrix cov (3x3)
038                double[][] cov = mhd.getCovarianceMatrix();
039                System.out.println("cov = (sample covariance matrix)\n" + Matrix.toString(cov));
040                System.out.println();
041                
042                double[][] icov =  mhd.getInverseCovarianceMatrix();
043                System.out.println("icov = (inverse covariance matrix)\n" + Matrix.toString(icov)); 
044                System.out.println();
045                
046                RealMatrix U = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(mhd.getWhiteningTransformation());
047                System.out.println("U = (whitening transformation)\n" + Matrix.toString(U.getData()));
048                System.out.println();
049                
050                RealMatrix UTU = U.transpose().multiply(U);
051                System.out.println("UT*U = (must be same as icov)\n" + Matrix.toString(UTU.getData()));
052                System.out.println();
053                
054                double[][] whitened = whiten(samples, U);
055                double[][] covW = Statistics.covarianceMatrix(whitened, false);
056                System.out.println("covW = (ovariance matrix of whitened samples must be close to identity)\n" + Matrix.toString(covW));
057
058        }
059        
060        static double[][] makeSamples() {
061                Random rd = new Random(77);
062                double[][] s = new double[N][K];
063                for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
064                        for (int k = 0; k < K; k++) {
065                                s[i][k] = Sigma[k] * rd.nextGaussian() + Mu[k];
066                        }
067                }
068                return s;
069        }
070        
071        static double[][] whiten(double[][] samples, RealMatrix U) {
072                double[][] whitened = new double[samples.length][];
073                for (int i = 0; i < samples.length; i++) {
074                        whitened[i] = U.operate(samples[i]);
075                }
076                return whitened;
077        }
078        
079}
080
